name: Black and White (Sleep1!)
description:
Here are some screenshots of B&W, and some develpment stuff! First, Introducing the player!

This is the player! He/She doesn't have a body, or a face, or any facial features! That's because... well, I guess I just never made a body!

Then, there's... THE VOIDS!

"The Voids" are black and white voids, where you can only navigate the void's using hints. As in, trying to figure out the room using objects of the opposite color, hense the name of the game, Black & White!

Finally, Completing a level

You can find a hallway leading you into the next level! Thanks!
